segments.text: Hey , look . My admirer has struck again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Another note ? But how ? I didn't see anyone !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's an e-mail . It says , We need to meet . I'll give you a sweet treat . It's not what you think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh-oh . He's heating up . What are you going to do now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , I think I know who my admirer is .
segments.speaker: S2
